comment: Great App, "It has Certainly Served a Good Purpose, during Tough Times"!!  I Couldn't have Expected any Better.. (Especially for Free/ at No Cost).. lol.  -> • On Behalf of It's.. "Peculiar Sufficient,             Dependability", Via/ A Wi-Fi Connection"!!

author: Bryanna Wakes
comment: This app has surely decreased in quality. I've had this app for almost 4 years and for the past year it would crash, bug my phone,  and I can never seem to get in a full phone conversation anymore. It is inconvenient and infuriating. I have given feedback on multiple occasions and they never seem to fix it. Uninstalling

reply.author: TextNow, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Bryanna, thanks for your feedback. If you have not yet deleted the app we'd like to speak with you further to get some additional details and help resolve any issues you may be having. Please email community@textnow.com if you'd like to work with us on resolving this issue.

comment: It is pretty awesome! The service works just as any other mobile service does. The only difference is text now is used off your Wi-Fi only unless you purchase one of the plans. I highly recommend bringing your own device if it is capitible to use through text now service. However, if you are looking for something to temporarily get you by and need a phone plan and phone that is cheap. Text now is your go too.

author: Smn Ferns
comment: This is THE BEST app. Now I can text and call my friends on their number without sharing my personal one. It's so simple. Get a number, Share your number or just start chatting with friends without any extra money or any privacy problems. Thanks to the developers

author: Lauren Hardina
comment: I downloaded this app because my boyfriend lost his cell phone when his house burnt down a few months ago. I decidee to let him use my cell because I had a tablet & this was a great option for us. We both have had problems with this app... shutting down mid-way through phone calls/texts AND locking up our devices because the app runs so slow. Another feature that I feel like this app should add.... is a contacts list. Just like on a regular cell phone. I have people on my contacts list that I would love to get rid of and it's IMPOSSIBLE to do so on this app. How could a calling/texting app not think of making that easier?!

reply.author: TextNow, Inc.
reply.content:
Hi,

 we would definitely like to look into this for you. If you would like assistance, please email community@textnow.com with a brief description of what you're experiencing and your TextNow phone number or username. We hope to hear from you soon to get this resolved!

Thanks

comment: I think this is a really great app if you don't have a phone number. And you get free number and like the whole thing is for free.so I would recommend people to use this app .I love this app.

author: Ace Majik
comment: Application lags, very slow to receive texts, and most time calls are not received. Only missed call notifications. Sound drops randomly. There is a delay for audio when connecting calls. Only missed call notifications. Please fix bugs

reply.author: TextNow, Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Ace Majik,

We want to help make your experience better! Can you please email your username and a brief description about the issue you are having to community@textnow.com and we'll be more than happy to look into this for you.

Thanks.

reply.author: TextNow, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Scott, thanks for the review. We are currently aware of this bug and working on a resolution. We're hoping to have this bug fix released to you and other users as soon as possible!
